title: What Do You Do If He's Bad In Bed? Sex Therapist Brooke Faught Weighs In
description:
Our listener reached out to us seeking advice for a problem she's having in the bedroom with her husband. So today, our sexual health expert, Brooke Faught, joins us to help our listener. She is a nurse practitioner and sex med provider in Nashville.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
